sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Form ,Button} from "react-bootstrap" import cookie from "react-cookies" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router" import API, { endpoints } from "../Configs/API" import Modal from 'react-modal' import '../CSS/Booking.css' import $ from 'jquery' export default function Booking (){ const [detail , setDetail] = useState([]) const [adult ,setAdult] = useState(1) const [child , setChild] = useState(0) const [room ,setRoom] = useState(0) const [room_price , setRoom_price] = useState(0) const [is_open , setIs_open] = useState(false) const [status,setStatus] = useState("p") const {tourdetailId} = useParams() const user = useSelector(state => state.user.user) // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps useEffect( async()=>{ try { let res =await API.get(endpoints['tour_detail'](tourdetailId)) setDetail(res.data) console.log(res.data) }catch(err){ console.error(err) } },[]) let openMOdal = ()=>{ setIs_open(true) } let closeMOdal = ()=>{ setIs_open(false) } const booking_action = async(event) =>{ event.preventDefault() try { let res = await API.post(endpoints['booking'](tourdetailId),{ 'adult' : adult, 'children' : child, 'room' : room, },{ headers :{ 'Authorization' : `Bearer ${cookie.load('access_token')}` } }) console.log(res.data) }catch(err){ console.error(err) } openMOdal() } let update_booking = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() let update = async()=>{ try { let res = await API.get(endpoints['update_booking'](tourdetailId),{ headers: { 'Authorization' : `Bearer ${cookie.load('access_token')}` } }) console.log(res.data) }catch(err){ console.error(err) } } update() } $('.btn_update_address').on('click',function(){ }) return( <>
  • Home
  • Tours List
  • {detail.name}'s Tour
